decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
Drawing number 100-01 - Location plan, Drawing number P-01 B - Proposed floor plan and site plan, Drawing number P-02 - Proposed elevations and section,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The proposed external materials to be used in the development shall be as confirmed on the approved plans. For the avoidance of doubt, the outbuilding shall be clad in timber.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 75 Ashbourne Road Ealing W5 3DH only and not for any other use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the  site and to ensure that the  use of the building does not, by reason  of  any  other  activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG4, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document  (2013), policy D6 of  the  London  Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Prior to completion of the development hereby approved, details for (i) the boundary treatments and means of enclosure around the outbuilding, (ii) the planting (to comprise biodiverse plants), shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and the measures approved shall be provided prior to the first occupation of the development.  Any planting that is part of the approved scheme that within a period of five years after planting is removed, dies or becomes seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced in the next planting season and all planting shall be replaced with others of a similar size and species and in the same position, and shall be retained thereafter. . Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason:  To ensure a satisfactory standard of appearance and setting for the development and to ensure that the proposed development enhances the visual amenity of the locality, in the interests of the amenities of the occupants of the development  in accordance with policies 5.10, 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), the London Environment strategy (2018) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding to be used as gym.
